Offer Description

Dean of Faculty of Law and Economics of Jan Dlugosz University in Częstochowa announces the competition for the position of a professor in the research and teaching group, in the discipline of legal sciences (theory and philosophy of law), at the Faculty of Law and Economics of Jan Dlugosz University in Częstochowa.

Where to apply

E-mail

wpie@ujd.edu.pl

Requirements

Research Field

Juridical sciences » Other

Education Level

PhD or equivalent

Skills/Qualifications

All candidates must meet the requirements set forth in Article 113 points 1 and 2 of the Law of July 20, 2018 - Law of Higher Education and Sciences.

All candidates must:

have professor title;

have outstanding scientific achievements contributing to the development of the field of law (theory and philosophy of law), in particular:

- scientific publications, including articles in international journals recognised by the Ministry of Education and Science and awarded high number of points

- leadership in research projects with external funding, with the candidate as principal investigator

organisational achievements, in particular organisation of conferences contributing to the development of the discipline

experience in organisation or participation in various forms of international cooperation

high teaching competencies valuable for the discipline of law and didactics in higher education in the field, in which the candidate will teach (mainly - law and administration)

Scientific publications planned to be published and affiliated with Jan Dlugosz University will be additionally rewarded.

Rector of the Jan Długosz University reserves the right to lower the requirements, in justified cases, taking into consideration candidate's qualifications that are valuable for the development of the represented discipline and necessary for realisation of scientific and didactic policy of the University.

Additional Information

Selection process

List of necessary documents:

indication of the competition number WPiE.111.11.2024 in the offer;

application to the Rector;

personal questionnaire, in case of first-time employment (template in attachment no. 3)

copy of higher education diplomas;

information on scientific, didactic and organisational achievements in the represented discipline (template in attachment no. 4);

declaration that the Jan Dlugosz University will be candidate's first place of employment (template in attachment no. 5)

declaration on the scientific discipline (template in attachment no. 6)

declaration concerning the N-number (template in attachment no. 7)

declaration of no disciplinary penalty, full legal capacity, exercise of full public rights as well as declaration of no criminal record (template in attachment no. 8);

declaration expressing consent to the processing of personal data for the purposes of the recruitment process (template in attachment no. 9).

All documents and templates are available under http://www.wpie.ujd.edu.pl/1165,Dokumenty-do-zatrudnienia ( in docx format)

Jan Dlugosz University reserves the right to withdraw from the settlement of the competition without giving a reason.

The result of the competition is not tantamount to candidate's employment, but is the recommendation to the Rector. The final decision is taken by the Rector.

Applicatons with the necessary documentation should be submitted to the secretariat of the Faculty of Law and Economics or by post to the following address: 42-200 Częstochowa, ul. Zbierskiego 2/4, pok. 207, tel. (34)378-31-44 until 5th of August 2024 at 3:00 p.m

In order to meet the deadline for submitting applications, the date of their reception by the University is decisive. The competition will be Interested candidates will be informed about the results of the competition (September 2024).
